title: How To Make Cornmeal Using Popcorn
full_text:
How To Make Cornmeal Using Popcorn
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
0 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
22 1/4 cup servings
Makes
5 1/2 cups of cornmeal
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
(
32-ounce) bag
of
popcorn
Directions
In a high-powered blender, and starting at low speed and gradually increasing speed to high, blend popcorn kernels until meal is consistently ground to either a "fine" degree, depending on your needs (assessing "fine" is something you'll need to do visually, based on existing commercial products as a benchmark).
Serious Eats / Molly Sheridan
Notes
This recipe can easily be scaled up or down depending on the amount of cornmeal you need and the capacity of your blender bowl.
Make-Ahead and Storage
Cornmeal can be stored in an airtight plastic container on the shelf for several months.
